column2: While there is no agreement between scholars on the proper way of serving the gods, each and every of them is concerned about being virtuous and adhering to certain moral standards. Virtue matters while interacting with scholars of the realm.
Celestinianism is a complex of various beliefs and practices united through common referral to the True Sky as the guiding principle of the universe.
Scholasticism is a name for the worldview developed by Auletian scholastes long before the Hestic Hegemonia was established.
This character follows Eraunatic branch of Celestinian faith
This character follows Anachoritic branch of Celestinian faith
This character follows Oikumenic branch of Celestinian faith
This character follows Koinobiotic branch of Celestinian faith
This character follows Arcadic branch of Celestinian faith
This character follows Meletatic branch of Celestinian faith
